lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did the Israelites say when they couldn't find food?
answers: Wish we'd died in Egypt; we had all the food we wanted
God will surely feed us soon
Let's hunt for food in the desert
Let's go fishing in the Red Sea

questions.text: When the people grumbled to Moses, who were they really complaining about?
What food did God send the people to eat?
answers: Quail in the evening and manna bread in the morning

questions.text: What did they call the bread from heaven? What was it like?
answers: Manna; it was flaky, white, and sweet
God-Bread; it was hard and bitter
Cake; it was soft and warm

questions.text: What happened when people tried to save the manna?
answers: It smelled and was full of maggots
It caught on fire and burned down their tents

questions.text: What did God tell the people to do on the sixth day?
answers: Gather twice as much so the could rest on the Sabbath
Gather less food and eat quickly
Eat twice so they don't get hungry on the Sabbath

questions.text: When the people complained about water, what did God have Moses do?
answers: Moses struck a rock and water came out
Moses led them to a river

questions.text: When they couldn't find water, what did the people want to do to Moses?
What did the Amalekites do to the Israelites?
What happened during the battle with the Amalekites?
answers: When Moses held his staff high they won; Aaron and Hur held up his arms and Joshua's men won the battle
The Israelites ran back to Egypt
The Egyptians came to rescue the Israelites
